column3: “Splendors” is what we've taken to callin' the tools, gear, and other quality items we offer as incentive to our suppliers.
You'll need tokens─beggin' your pardon, <Emphasis>Rowena's</Emphasis> tokens─to purchase these items. No other forms of payment will be accepted.
The tokens you'll need are issued in exchange for scrips. Our representatives here can assist you now, if you like.
Of course, if you're short on scrips, you'll have to bring us more collectables...
